title: If you don't put vegetables on your sandwhiches, you are doing a disservice
body: to the art of sandwhich making. I'm sorry, my brother and sister do this too... They don't order any vegetables, they just want the meat, cheese, and bread. It really ticks me off. Sandwhichs are meant to be LOADED with vegetables, that is what makes them so delicious. Grrrr....
